Name: Tambourine player
Description: This figurine of terracotta depicts a woman standing on an oval base. She is wearing a fringed mantle fastened on the chest. Her hairstyle is composed of wavy bands surmounted by a crown of flowerets with curls falling on her shoulders. In her left hand, she holds a tambourine that she strikes with her right hand. The piece probably dates from the 1st century of our time.
